verbs.description: President Trump [V: is] once again going after the office of special counsel Robert Mueller , this time in response to the House Intel Committee majority 's report released today .

[ARG0: President Trump] is [ARGM-TMP: once again] [V: going] [ARG1: after the office of special counsel Robert Mueller] , [ARGM-TMP: this time] [ARGM-PRP: in response to the House Intel Committee majority 's report released today] .

President Trump is once again going after the office of special counsel Robert Mueller , this time in response to [ARG1: the House Intel Committee majority 's report] [V: released] [ARGM-TMP: today] .
